sendChatMessage(String) - Method in class network.Client
Sends a chat message to the server when the player has entered a message in the chat box of the game scene.

Sends a game exited message to the server.

Sends a game move message to the server when the player makes a game move in the game scene.

Sends a game reset finished message to the server.
